meanings.sent1: She wanted to physicalize her dream of becoming a dancer by practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: The artist was able to physicalize his vision by sculpting a beautiful statue.
meanings.sent3: Trying to physicalize a rainbow would be quite a colorful challenge!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to physicalize her goals was as solid as concrete.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick helped physicalize the concept of disappearing into thin air.

meanings.sent1: The actor had to physicalize the character's emotions through expressive movements.
meanings.sent2: The dancer was able to physicalize the music with graceful movements.
meanings.sent3: It would be amusing to physicalize a cloud and try to float in the sky!
meanings.sent4: His love for nature seemed to physicalize in the way he cared for his garden.
meanings.sent5: The storm's intensity helped physicalize the power of nature in the eyes of the spectators.
